name: WP Zoho for Contact Form 7, WPForms, Elementor, Formidable and Ninja Forms – CRM, Bigin
author: CRM Perks

sections.description:
Contact Form 7 Zoho Plugin sends form submissions from Contact Form 7, WPforms, Elementor Forms, Ninja Forms, Formidable Forms, Contact Forms Entries Plugin and many other popular contact form plugins to Zoho CRM and Bigin when someone submits a form. Learn more at crmperks.com

How to Setup

  • Go to “Zoho Accounts” tab and add new account.
  • Go to “Zoho Feeds” tab , create new feed.
  • Map required Zoho fields to contact form 7 fields.
  • Send your test entry to Zoho CRM.
  • Go to “Zoho Logs” tab and verify, if entry was sent to Zoho CRM.

Connect Zoho CRM account

Connect any contact form 7 to Zoho account by simply entering zoho API key. Easily connect multiple Zoho account to wordpress.

Map Zoho CRM fields

Map any contact form 7 fields to any Zoho object(Contacts, Account, Lead, Order, Case) fields. No limitation on number of fields.

Filter contact form 7 submissions

Send all or filter contact form 7 submissions sent to Zoho CRM based on user input.

Manually send to Zoho CRM

Send contact form 7 submissions to Zoho CRM on form submission. You can manually send contact form 7 submissions to Zoho CRM.

Zoho logs

View a detailed log of each contact form 7 submission sent (or not sent) to Zoho CRM and easily resend contact form 7 submission to Zoho CRM.

Send Data As Zoho object Notes

Send one to many contact form 7 fields as Zoho object(Contacts, Account, Lead, Order, Case) notes.

Create Or Update Contact in Zoho (Premium feature)

If an entry(Contacts, Account, Lead, Order, Case) already exists in Zoho CRM, update it otherwise create a new entry in Zoho CRM.

Why we built this plugin

Contact Form 7 and some other popular contact forms are good but you can not send contact form 7 submissions to any crm including Zoho CRM. You can send to any contact form(contact form 7) submissions to zoho CRM with this free plugin.

Premium Version Features.

This plugin has a Premium version which comes with several additional benifits Contact Form Zoho.

  • Custom fields of Zoho CRM.
  • Phone fields of all Zoho Objects.
  • Custom modules of Zoho CRM.
  • Set Lead Source and Status in Zoho CRM.
  • Zoho CRM attachments and tags.
  • Assign object(Contact,Account etc) to Zoho Task.
  • Zoho Object Layouts and approval mode.
  • Create/Update an account in Zoho CRM and assign it to any object(Contact,lead etc).
  • Assign object(Contact,lead etc) Owner in Zoho CRM.

    Add as Campaign member in Zoho.

  • Google Analytics Parameters and Geolocation of a visitor who submitted the form.
  • Lookup lead’s email and Phone Number using email and phone lookup apis.
  • 20+ premium addons

Need Zoho Plugin for Woocommerce ?

We have a Woocommerce connector for Zoho CRM, Books, Invoice, Inventory. Woocommerce Zoho Integration

Want to send data to other crm

We have Premium Extensions for 20+ CRMs.View All CRM Extensions
sections.faq:
Where can I get support?

Our team provides free support at https://www.crmperks.com/contact-us/.

Contact form 7 zoho leads integration

You can easily capture leads from your wordpress site. Simply install free Contact form 7 then install this free Zoho Plugin.

Zoho crm integration with wordpress

You can easily integrate zoho crm with wordpress. Simply embed contact form 7 form any where on your site then map contact form fields to any Zoho Object(Lead, Account, Contact etc) fields.

WPforms Zoho crm

  • Easily connect WPforms to your zoho CRM or Bigin account.
  • Create feeds for Zoho CRM or Bigin Contacts, Deals etc.
  • New WPforms submission will be automatically sent to Zoho Bigin.

Elementor form to zoho crm

  • Connect Elementor form to your zoho CRM or Bigin account.
  • Create feeds for Zoho CRM or Bigin Contacts, leads etc.
  • When someone submits Elementor form, submission will be automatically sent to Zoho CRM or Bigin.
  • You can manually send any Elementor form entry to Zoho Bigin by clicking “send to Zoho” button.

Contact Form 7 Zoho CRM Integration

You can easily inegrate Contact Form 7 to Zoho CRM. Simply select zoho object then Map contact form 7 form fields any Zoho object(Lead, Account, Contact, Order, Case etc) fields.

Ninja Forms Zoho

  • Easily connect Ninja Forms to your zoho CRM or Bigin account.
  • Create feeds for Zoho CRM or Bigin Contacts, Account etc.
  • New Ninja Forms submission will be automatically sent to Zoho CRM or Bigin.
  • You can manually send any Ninja Forms entry to Zoho CRM or Bigin by clicking “send to Zoho” button.

Formidable Forms Zoho

  • Connect your zoho CRM or Bigin account with our Zoho plugin.
  • Create feeds for Zoho CRM or Bigin Contacts, Lead etc. Select correct Formidable Form in feed.
  • New Formidable Form submission will be automatically sent to Zoho CRM or Bigin.
  • You can manually send any Formidable Form entry to Zoho CRM or Bigin by clicking “send to Zoho” button.

Contact Form 7 Zoho Bigin Integration

  • Easily connect Contact Form 7 to your zoho Bigin account.
  • Create feeds for Zoho Bigin Contacts, Deals etc.
  • New Contact Form 7 submission will be automatically sent to Zoho Bigin.
  • You can manually send any Contact form 7 entry to Zoho Bigin by clicking “send to Zoho” button.
sections.changelog:
1.2.8

  • fixed “id field of wpforms”.

1.2.7

  • upgraded API version to v6.

1.2.6

  • added “uk, jp and ca datacenters”.

1.2.5

  • fixed “duplicate error” issue.
  • added elementor and ninja forms.

1.2.4

  • fixed “sql injection issue”.

1.2.3

  • fixed “CSRF issue with settings tab”.

1.2.2

  • added “zoho triggers” field.

1.2.1

  • added “zoho bigin”.

1.2.0

  • fixed “escape variables” issue.

1.1.9

  • fixed “add field” button not working issue.

1.1.8

  • fixed “xss date” issue.

1.1.7

  • fixed “entry date” issue.

1.1.6

  • fixed “real file upload” feature.

1.1.5

  • fixed multiselectpicklist field.

1.1.4

  • fixed file field warning.

1.1.3

  • added assignment rule support.
  • fixed “assign one object to other” feature.

1.1.2

  • added zoho.com.au support.

1.1.1

  • added “fileupload” field support.
  • fixed boolean field.

1.1.0

  • fixed empty “website” field issue.

1.0.9

  • fixed mapping list field to Zoho text field.

1.0.8

  • fixed lead source and status fields.

1.0.7

  • fixed invalid_data error if field value is empty.

1.0.6

  • added gclid field.
  • added files support.

1.0.5

  • fixed slash in datetime value.

1.0.4

  • fixed empty form fields list on new adding new field.
  • fixed undefined variable warning in api.php.

1.0.3

  • added support for multi-lookup field.

1.0.2

  • added Zoho Api v2.
  • fixed “Error while getting fields” error.

1.0.1

  • fixed contact form 7 forms selectbox.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.
